title: AT Kupyansk Directive Russian Army Shelled Sinkivka, Stepova Novoselevka, Kotlyarevka OF Harkiv Region, - General Staff of OF A ...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
